title: New Kuat 2″ Hitch Adapter Turns the Piston SR Roof Rack Into a One-Bike Hitch Rack!
content:
Turn your Piston SR roof rack into a hitch rack with the new 2-inch adapter from Kuat.

The post New Kuat 2″ Hitch Adapter Turns the Piston SR Roof Rack Into a One-Bike Hitch Rack! appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
